cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.4)

include(Reprojucer)


if(NOT DEFINED AUv3Synth_jucer_FILE)
  message(FATAL_ERROR "AUv3Synth_jucer_FILE must be defined")
endif()

get_filename_component(AUv3Synth_jucer_FILE
  "${AUv3Synth_jucer_FILE}" ABSOLUTE
  BASE_DIR "${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}"
)

  PROJECT_FILE "${AUv3Synth_jucer_FILE}"
  PROJECT_ID "NaPIav"
)
